title.text: Hello, I am {strong1}, a frontend developer.

intro: ðŸ‘‹ This is the kind of developer I am.
contents: I strive to write clean code that is easy to understand and naturally extendable.
I enjoy collaborating with backend developers and designers through frequent communication.
I focus on reducing unnecessary code and improving processes to make development easier for the team.
I document and share challenges encountered during solo or team development.
I grow through code reviews and always listen to better approaches with an open mind.
I maintain my physical health with regular exercise to stay in top condition for development.
